Row.Text: Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics
Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics
Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics

[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes between multiple continents receive +2 [ICON_Production] Production for routes between your own cities. +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing from Thearther/Campus/Commercial Hub/Aqueduct adjacent to Bonus Resouces. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from Theater adjacent to mine.

Allows Farms to be built on Tundra terrain. After Civil Engineering is unlocked Farms can be built on Tundra Hills. +50% [ICON_Production] Production toward Builders. +1 [ICON_Food] Food from all bonus resouces.
Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics unique unit that replaces the Musket Man. Stronger than the Musket Man. When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 50 hit points.
Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics unique unit: Hessian

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Akari Highland Farm, unique to Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Food] Food for each adjacent Mountains. +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each adjacent Plantation and Quarry. +2 [ICON_Production] Production for each adjacent Industrial Zone. Can be built on Hills.
Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics unique improvement: Akari Highland Farm

A building unique to Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics. Replaces the Amphitheater and cheaper to build. +1 additional [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each era since constructed or last repaired. +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing.
Union of Akari Kizuna Socialist Republics unique building: Voiceloid Big Theater
